name: rr-realty-ai-testing
description: Puppeteer testing scripts for RR Realty AI

scripts.test:headless: node -e "const Tester = require('./puppeteer-test'); (async () => { const t = new Tester(); await t.launch({headless: true}); await t.runFullTest(); await t.close(); })()"

author: RR Realty AI Team
